title: PROJECT: Yasuo skin rework?
body:
Hey, I was just wondering if Riot was ever thinking about updating the PROJECT: Yasuo skin. It was made well before all the other project skins and his recall animation and effects in my opinion have nowhere near as much detail as the others do, and I'm sure I'm not alone on this one. Also, will his skin be on sale again soon?

Thanks, :D {{champion:157}}

replies.body:
Considering actual champs like udyr are so outdated design wise and haven't been updated for years, its unlikely they'll update something that came out last year and that is only a skin, not even an actual champ.

also if they did do it, it would be the first time in lol history (to my knowledge) that a skin was updated like this without a champ update as well.

so its unlikely, but yasuo is one of the better project skins anyway.
